title: Spotify Playlist Email Scraper
description: Searches Spotify playlists and extracts email addresses from descriptions for music submission opportunities

searchQuery.title: Search Query
searchQuery.description: Search term to find playlists (e.g., 'indie', 'submit music', 'playlist submission')

maxPlaylists.title: Maximum Playlists
maxPlaylists.description: Maximum number of playlists to check for emails

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings to avoid being blocked

includePrivatePlaylists.title: Include Private Playlists
includePrivatePlaylists.description: Whether to include playlists that might be private (requires login)

emailRegex.title: Email Pattern
emailRegex.description: Regular expression pattern to match email addresses (advanced users only)

debugMode.title: Debug Mode
debugMode.description: Save all playlists data, not just those with emails (for debugging)
